price: “Yemwe bantu banjye! Dore iyi ngamiya ya Allah ni ikimenyetso kuri mwe, bityo nimuyireke irishe ku butaka bwa Allah, kandi ntimuzayisagarire mutazavaho mugerwaho n’ibihano byegereje.”
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمۡ ءَايَةٗۖ فَذَرُوهَا تَأۡكُلۡ فِيٓ أَرۡضِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابٞ قَرِيبٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi hādhihi nāqatu al-lahi lakum āyatan fadharūhā takul fī arḍi al-lahi walā tamassūhā bisūin fayakhudhakum ʿadhābun qarībun
